name: Hidden Recipe 1
description: A recipe that produces no effects.  It is hidden from the user, but can still be made in-game.

name: Hidden Recipe 2
description: A recipe that produces no effects.  It is hidden from the user, and cannot be made in-game.

name: Jambon-Beurre
description: A sandwich with just ham and butter in it. So simple that there's no way to fake it.

name: Bitter Jambon-Beurre
description: A Jambon-Beurre with a bitter twist. If you love a touch of bitterness, you'll want to eat this.
location: From man in Sandwich Shop if you have Bitter Herba Mystica

name: Sweet Jambon-Beurre
description: A Jambon-Beurre with a sweet twist. Seeking the finest sweetness around? Look no further.
location: From man in Sandwich Shop if you have Sweet Herba Mystica

name: Salty Jambon-Beurre
description: A Jambon-Beurre with a salty twist. Packs a delicious salty punch.
location: From man in Sandwich Shop if you have Salty Herba Mystica

name: Sour Jambon-Beurre
description: A Jambon-Beurre with a sour twist. Its vivid acidic notes will leave you wanting another.
location: From man in Sandwich Shop if you have Sour Herba Mystica

name: Spicy Jambon-Beurre
description: A Jambon-Beurre with a spicy twist. If you like a sandwich with some kick to it, don't miss this.
location: From man in Sandwich Shop if you have Spicy Herba Mystica

name: Legendary Bitter Sandwich
description: A sandwich known as the ultimate in bitter taste. The herbs should be laid on thick.
location: From man in Sandwich Shop if you have Bitter Herba Mystica

name: Legendary Salty Sandwich
description: A sandwich for the true salt aficionado. When eating this, make absolutely certain to have a drink at hand.
location: From man in Sandwich Shop if you have Sweet Herba Mystica

name: Legendary Sweet Sandwich
description: A sandwich so sweet it's downright frightening. The trick is to really pile on the herbs.
location: From man in Sandwich Shop if you have Salty Herba Mystica

name: Legendary Sour Sandwich
description: A sandwich devoted to true fans of sour flavors. The fresher the herbs, the more potent the sourness.
location: From man in Sandwich Shop if you have Sour Herba Mystica

name: Legendary Spicy Sandwich
description: A sandwich so spicy it practically assaults the tongue. Dislikers of spicy food, beware.
location: From man in Sandwich Shop if you have Spicy Herba Mystica

name: Jam Sandwich
description: A sandwich made with only jam and slices of strawberry. The simplicity of this dish is what makes it so appetizing.

name: Great Jam Sandwich
description: The addition of yogurt has heightened the sweetness and deepened the richness of this sandwich.

name: Ultra Jam Sandwich
description: Filling enough to be a meal, tasty enough to be a snack. It's best when you choose the sweetest pineapples.

name: Master Jam Sandwich
description: A truly perfected sandwich, with the addition of the herbs elevating all the other fillings.
location: From man in Sandwich shop if you have Sweet Herba Mystica

name: Peanut Butter Sandwich
description: Peanut butter and bananas make a surprisingly nice pair. They leave you feeling full and satisfied.

name: Great Peanut Butter Sandwich
description: Adding butter into the mix has contributed yet more substance, making this one robust sandwich.

name: Ultra Peanut Butter Sandwich
description: The jam adds a new note of sweetness, making this sandwich yet more filling.

name: Master Peanut Butter Sandwich
description: The daring addition of bold spice has made this sandwich strangely addicting.
location: From man in Sandwich shop if you have Spicy Herba Mystica

name: Pickle Sandwich
description: This sandwich keeps it profoundly simple. It's best when you don't skimp on the olive oil.

name: Great Pickle Sandwich
description: The sourness of the pickles pairs with the fresh taste of the watercress for a sandwich as refreshing as a light breeze.

name: Ultra Pickle Sandwich
description: The fragrant basil draws out new depths of flavor from this sandwich's fillings.

name: Master Pickle Sandwich
description: The hit of sourness from the added herbs will leave you wanting more of this simple yet satisfying sandwich.
location: From man in Sandwich shop if you have Sour Herba Mystica

name: Marmalade Sandwich
description: A simple, economical, and tasty sandwich. Toasting it for extra flavor is also good.

name: Great Marmalade Sandwich
description: The sweetness of the butter highlights the sourness. But add too much butter, and you'll spoil the overall flavor.

name: Ultra Marmalade Sandwich
description: The stronger the marmalade's sourness, the better. This sandwich is particularly appealing.

name: Master Marmalade Sandwich
description: The finishing touch of saltiness is the clincher. This sandwich's exquisite balance of flavor brings it to life.
location: From man in Sandwich shop if you have Salty Herba Mystica

name: Herbed-Sausage Sandwich
description: Sausage with fragrant herbs meets ketchup in this sandwich.

name: Great Herbed-Sausage Sandwich
description: The sour bite and spiciness of the mustard takes this sandwich to the next level.

name: Ultra Herbed-Sausage Sandwich
description: This sandwich boasts fresh vegetables and sausage— a faultless combo.

name: Master Herbed-Sausage Sandwich
description: A sandwich with a tried-and-true type of tastiness. The bitter flavor really ties all the fillings together.
location: From man in Sandwich shop if you have Bitter Herba Mystica

name: Curry-and-Rice-Style Sandwich
description: A tricky proposition of a sandwich. You might try lightly toasting the curry powder.

name: Great Curry-and-Rice-Style Sandwich
description: The spicy addition has made this sandwich a bit more palatable, but still, it's not necessarily for everyone.

name: Ultra Curry-and-Rice-Style Sandwich
description: With tasty tomatoes, this sandwich is more approachable than ever—and yet it remains an acquired taste.

name: Master Curry-and-Rice-Style Sandwich
description: A sandwich of intense, provocative spiciness. For all the added ingredients, it remains an adventurous choice.
location: From man in Sandwich shop if you have Spicy Herba Mystica

name: Dessert Sandwich
description: This sandwich is just the thing for dessert time. The yogurt is on the sweeter side.

name: Great Dessert Sandwich
description: The addition of vibrant green kiwi makes this sandwich as pleasing to the eye as to the palate.

name: Ultra Dessert Sandwich
description: A sandwich with a lovely trio of fruits. It's a winner when served slightly chilled.

name: Master Dessert Sandwich
description: The Dessert Sandwich's ultimate form. Just a hint of herbs will do the trick.
location: From man in Sandwich shop if you have Sweet Herba Mystica

name: Tropical Sandwich
description: The balance of acidity and umami is key. A touch of extra marmalade is the trick to making it special.

name: Great Tropical Sandwich
description: The pineapple unlocks the tropical atmosphere. The more the sourness comes through, the tastier the sandwich.

name: Ultra Tropical Sandwich
description: A sandwich with an unfamiliar twist. The added spiciness brings depth to the flavors.

name: Master Tropical Sandwich
description: A sandwich befitting the “tropical” label. The herbs bring the flavors into tight unison.
location: From man in Sandwich shop if you have Sour Herba Mystica

name: Avocado Sandwich
description: The flavor of this sandwich changes depending on the ripeness of the avocado. One never tires of eating this one.

name: Great Avocado Sandwich
description: A sandwich with a firm flavor profile. With fillings so widely beloved, it's a sure hit.

name: Ultra Avocado Sandwich
description: A solidly delicious sandwich. It's impossible to go wrong with these fillings—this is flavor you can depend on.

name: Master Avocado Sandwich
description: The steadfast sandwich in its ultimate form. The salt works its magic, making for a profoundly tasty sandwich.
location: From man in Sandwich shop if you have Salty Herba Mystica

name: Noodle Sandwich
description: When exactly did this sandwich rise to fame? Where did the recipe even come from? Mysteries abound.

name: Great Noodle Sandwich
description: A nice, filling sandwich. The addition of lettuce makes it more approachable.

name: Ultra Noodle Sandwich
description: This sandwich will fill you up like few others do. The richness of the chorizo works wonders.

name: Master Noodle Sandwich
description: The touch of bitterness tugs at the appetite. This is one solid, substantial sandwich.
location: From man in Sandwich shop if you have Bitty Herba Mystica

name: Potato Salad Sandwich
description: A veggie-forward, filling sandwich. How tasty it ends up being depends entirely on the quality of the potato salad.

name: Great Potato Salad Sandwich
description: The veggies are the star players of this satisfying sandwich. Tasty even if the avocado is still a tad firm.

name: Ultra Potato Salad Sandwich
description: A sandwich boasting a plethora of different vegetables. Connoisseurs prefer generous amounts of seasoning.

name: Master Potato Salad Sandwich
description: The ultimate form of the Potato Salad Sandwich. The sweetness of the herbs is what will decide its success.
location: From man in Sandwich shop if you have Sweet Herba Mystica

name: Zesty Sandwich
description: The spiciness of the sauce brings the sweetness of the veggies to life in this sandwich.

name: Great Zesty Sandwich
description: The bitterness of this sandwich's green bell peppers goes perfectly with the spicy sauce.

name: Ultra Zesty Sandwich
description: A sandwich packing a nice dose of veggies, whose savory sides are brought out by the spicy sauce.

name: Master Zesty Sandwich
description: A sandwich with such a fine ratio of spiciness to sourness that you'll just keep reaching for more.
location: From man in Sandwich shop if you have Sour Herba Mystica

name: Egg Sandwich
description: A sandwich with pleasingly straightforward flavors. The fundamental taste of the egg gets to shine.

name: Great Egg Sandwich
description: The crunch and sweetness of the onion brings out the richness of the egg.

name: Ultra Egg Sandwich
description: For those who've gotten tired of the plain and simple Egg Sandwich. The egg and the cheese pair beautifully.

name: Master Egg Sandwich
description: The fully realized Egg Sandwich. Robust saltiness is its standout feature.
location: From man in Sandwich shop if you have Salty Herba Mystica

name: Classic Bocadillo
description: A sandwich with potent fillings. Young people in particular appreciate how substantial it is.

name: Great Classic Bocadillo
description: The spicy flavor gives this sandwich a comforting feel. Especially tasty when the potato tortilla is piping hot.

name: Ultra Classic Bocadillo
description: A sandwich that won't leave you hungry. Well-ripened avocados are better for this one.

name: Master Classic Bocadillo
description: A deeply substantial sandwich. The bitterness brings harmony to the flavors.
location: From man in Sandwich shop if you have Bitter Herba Mystica

name: Refreshing Sandwich
description: This sandwich feels like a cousin to a salad. The more tomatoes, the better.

name: Great Refreshing Sandwich
description: A fruit-forward sandwich. The kiwi's sourness does it plenty of favors.

name: Ultra Refreshing Sandwich
description: This sandwich may only have fruits and veggies in it, but it's tasty no matter how into veggies you are—or aren't.

name: Master Refreshing Sandwich
description: The spicy addition to the sandwich's mostly sour fillings and condiments creates a tantalizing flavor.
location: From man in Sandwich shop if you have Spicy Herba Mystica

name: BLT Sandwich
description: A tried and true sandwich. You can't go wrong with these classic, ordinary flavors.

name: Great BLT Sandwich
description: Adding basil lends a bit of a rich air to this BLT Sandwich.

name: Ultra BLT Sandwich
description: The cheese makes for a more filling experience. The flavors of this sandwich are in perfect balance.

name: Master BLT Sandwich
description: The hint of sweetness manages to preserve the harmony between all the fillings of this miraculous sandwich.
location: From man in Sandwich shop if you have Sweet Herba Mystica

name: Fried Fillet Sandwich
description: The potato salad plays an important part in counteracting the oiliness of the fried fillet.

name: Great Fried Fillet Sandwich
description: The fresh crunch of the lettuce matches exceptionally well with this sandwich's fried fillet.

name: Ultra Fried Fillet Sandwich
description: The horseradish's invigorating spiciness helps make this a very inviting sandwich.

name: Master Fried Fillet Sandwich
description: This is the ultimate expression of the Fried Fillet Sandwich. The spicy kick makes it an absolute pleasure.
location: From man in Sandwich shop if you have Spicy Herba Mystica

name: Ham Sandwich
description: This sandwich is the embodiment of cheap and tasty. It tastes best when mayonnaise is applied generously.

name: Great Ham Sandwich
description: A sandwich boasting two different types of ham. A little rich, perhaps, but plenty tasty.

name: Ultra Ham Sandwich
description: The stimulating spiciness of the jalapeño draws out the savoriness of the ham.

name: Master Ham Sandwich
description: The ultimate Ham Sandwich, with a saltiness that caresses the taste buds. More ham, more happy.
location: From man in Sandwich shop if you have Salty Herba Mystica

name: Cheese Sandwich
description: A sandwich for the cheese lover. The simple seasonings make this a welcoming bite.

name: Great Cheese Sandwich
description: A sandwich that will certainly fill you up. It's tastiest when the avocado is just a tad firm.

name: Ultra Cheese Sandwich
description: The fragrance of the basil in this sandwich activates the appetite. Using plenty of pepper balances the flavors well.

name: Master Cheese Sandwich
description: The strong note of salt in this sandwich makes the richness and savoriness of the cheese shine through.
location: From man in Sandwich shop if you have Salty Herba Mystica

name: Hamburger Patty Sandwich
description: The hamburger patty is the heart and soul of this sandwich, but the vinegar's acidic note is what sets it apart.

name: Great Hamburger Patty Sandwich
description: The hamburger patty is the heart and soul of this sandwich, but the horseradish's spicy kick is what sets it apart.

name: Ultra Hamburger Patty Sandwich
description: The hamburger patty is the heart and soul of this sandwich, but the watercress's bitter taste is what sets it apart.

name: Master Hamburger Patty Sandwich
description: The hamburger patty is the heart and soul of this sandwich, but the herbs' sweetness is what sets it apart.
location: From man in Sandwich shop if you have Sweet Herba Mystica

name: Smoky Sandwich
description: A sandwich with a sophisticated flavor. Nailing the balance between the condiments is crucial.

name: Great Smoky Sandwich
description: A sandwich with a refreshing flavor. It's tastier if you don't go overboard on the vegetables.

name: Ultra Smoky Sandwich
description: A sandwich with a refined flavor. The fragrant basil goes well with the smoked fillet.

name: Master Smoky Sandwich
description: This sandwich is rumored in some circles to unequivocally be the best way to eat smoked fillet.
location: From man in Sandwich shop if you have Salty Herba Mystica

name: Fruit Sandwich
description: Full of fruit. The sophisticated approach is to go easy on the cream and let the ingredients speak for themselves.

name: Great Fruit Sandwich
description: This sandwich feels akin to a treat. Just a hint of marmalade is ideal.

name: Ultra Fruit Sandwich
description: This sandwich feels quite dessert-like. It's best when you don't go overboard on the yogurt.

name: Master Fruit Sandwich
description: A sandwich whose flavors positively sing. It's best when you don't go overboard on the herbs.
location: From man in Sandwich shop if you have Sweet Herba Mystica

name: Variety Sandwich
description: A sandwich with a range of flavors to enjoy. The fillings can be in whatever proportions you like.

name: Great Variety Sandwich
description: A sandwich popular with younger folks. The potato salad leaves you pleasantly full.

name: Ultra Variety Sandwich
description: The addition of hamburger brings more heft. Younger folks tend to like this with plenty of condiments.

name: Master Variety Sandwich
description: A connoisseur's sandwich, with the fillings tied together by a supreme note of bitterness.
location: From man in Sandwich shop if you have Bitter Herba Mystica

name: Klawf Claw Sandwich
description: A sandwich that fills you up well without being too heavy. Ideal for those in search of a light meal.

name: Great Klawf Claw Sandwich
description: A sandwich for the somewhat mature palate, with an addictively spicy note from the sauce.

name: Ultra Klawf Claw Sandwich
description: A sandwich that spares no detail. The crunch of the bell pepper provides a lovely accent.

name: Master Klawf Claw Sandwich
description: This sandwich's savory flavors stand out even more boldly thanks to the boost of spiciness.
location: From man in Sandwich shop if you have Spicy Herba Mystica

name: Sweet Sandwich
description: It's a close cousin to the Fruit Sandwich, but the butter sets this one apart.

name: Great Sweet Sandwich
description: The pinch of salt serves to tease out the sweetness of this sandwich's fillings.

name: Ultra Sweet Sandwich
description: The basil's light touch of bitter flavor helps bring this sandwich's other fillings to life.

name: Master Sweet Sandwich
description: A sandwich with a subtle note of sourness. The slightest amount of herbs is all that's needed.
location: From man in Sandwich shop if you have Sour Herba Mystica

name: Vegetable Sandwich
description: A juicy, vegetable-laden sandwich. The fresher the veggies, the tastier the dish.
location: From your mother in Cabo Poco

name: Great Vegetable Sandwich
description: A sandwich featuring an all-veggie lineup of fillings. The condiments play a major role in the overall flavor.
location: From your mother in Cabo Poco

name: Ultra Vegetable Sandwich
description: Veggies are this sandwich's bread and butter, so to speak. Adding plenty of watercress firms up the flavor.
location: From your mother in Cabo Poco

name: Master Vegetable Sandwich
description: The fully realized all-veggie sandwich. The overall quality depends hugely on how thickly you lay on the herbs.
location: From your mother in Cabo Poco if you have Salty Herba Mystica

name: Hefty Sandwich
description: A sandwich that only has time for the ingredients that'll fill you up the best.

name: Great Hefty Sandwich
description: A sandwich whose main goal is filling up the tummy. Flavor is nice, but quantity is the main concern.

name: Ultra Hefty Sandwich
description: A sandwich devoted to the cause of filling up the tummy. Eaters should know what they're getting into.

name: Master Hefty Sandwich
description: A bright acidic note makes this sandwich a pleasure to eat, though it doesn't change the impact of the sheer volume.
location: From man in Sandwich shop if you have Sour Herba Mystica

name: Five-Alarm Sandwich
description: As the name suggests, this sandwich packs a bit of heat. Enjoying these veggies is a mark of grown-up taste.

name: Great Five-Alarm Sandwich
description: Achieving proper balance between the condiments is delicate work. The fragrance of basil whets the appetite.

name: Ultra Five-Alarm Sandwich
description: This sandwich has become yet spicier and more appealing to grown-up tastes. It's not necessarily for everyone.

name: Master Five-Alarm Sandwich
description: This sandwich is spicy to the core. If you're not seeking such stimulation, it may not be for you.
location: From man in Sandwich shop if you have Spicy Herba Mystica

name: Nouveau Veggie Sandwich
description: A vegetable-centric sandwich whose sauce delivers a particular shocking kick.

name: Great Nouveau Veggie Sandwich
description: This sandwich boasts an all-star vegetable cast. It's best to eat it immediately after the cucumber has been added.
location: From your mother in Cabo Poco

name: Ultra Nouveau Veggie Sandwich
description: A sandwich one can proudly offer to a veggie lover. Use just enough mayonnaise to provide a little flavor accent.
location: From your mother in Cabo Poco

name: Master Nouveau Veggie Sandwich
description: Veggies are this sandwich's sole purpose. Adding a touch of sweet makes the veggies' natural savoriness stand out.
location: From your mother in Cabo Poco if you have Sweet Herba Mystica

name: Spicy-Sweet Sandwich
description: A sandwich that pairs the sweetness of butter with the spicy kick of horseradish.

name: Great Spicy-Sweet Sandwich
description: The richness of the avocado shines in this sandwich. The balance between the fruits is key to making it tasty.

name: Ultra Spicy-Sweet Sandwich
description: This sandwich walks a tightrope between sweet and spicy. Tastiest when the cheese is abundant.

name: Master Spicy-Sweet Sandwich
description: The hint of bitterness in this sandwich creates a new harmony between the spicy and sweet flavors.
location: From man in Sandwich shop if you have Bitter Herba Mystica

name: Decadent Sandwich
description: This sandwich's fillings speak for themselves—loudly— so it's tastiest when you go light on the condiments.

name: Great Decadent Sandwich
description: This sandwich uses truly precious and fine ingredients. The tofu lends it more substance.

name: Ultra Decadent Sandwich
description: Achieving balance between these ingredients is no easy feat. Tastiest when the seasonings are piled on a bit.

name: Master Decadent Sandwich
description: Adding the ultimate in spiciness makes this sandwich of distinct, vibrant ingredients into a unified masterpiece.
location: From man in Sandwich shop if you have Spicy Herba Mystica

name: Tofu Sandwich
description: A sandwich designed by and for tofu lovers. It will never leave you hungry.

name: Great Tofu Sandwich
description: This sandwich is not the easiest to pull off. Be sure to drain the tofu thoroughly.

name: Ultra Tofu Sandwich
description: The simple flavor of the tofu and the bitterness of the watercress make for a strangely appealing match.

name: Master Tofu Sandwich
description: The precious herbs' saltiness makes the tofu's savory notes shine through.
location: From man in Sandwich shop if you have Salty Herba Mystica

name: Curry-and-Noodle Sandwich
description: While others ask “why?,” this sandwich asks, “why not?” It's best when the curry powder is lightly toasted.

name: Great Curry-and-Noodle Sandwich
description: The eye-widening spiciness of the jalapeño heightens the curry flavor.

name: Ultra Curry-and-Noodle Sandwich
description: The eggs provide a mellow coating over the spicy flavors beneath.

name: Master Curry-and-Noodle Sandwich
description: The faint sweetness perfects the taste, bringing new depth and richness to the sandwich.
location: From man in Sandwich shop if you have Sweet Herba Mystica

name: Tower Sandwich
description: To this sandwich, the righteous path lies in sheer quantity. It's downright aggressive in its effort to fill you up.

name: Great Tower Sandwich
description: This sandwich prioritizes filling you up first and foremost. It's not particularly concerned with flavor.

name: Ultra Tower Sandwich
description: A sandwich concerned only with volume. It can be tasty, too, depending on the seasonings.

name: Master Tower Sandwich
description: Thanks to the magic of spice, this ultra-voluminous sandwich even manages to taste rather good.
location: From man in Sandwich shop if you have Bitter Herba Mystica

name: Sushi Sandwich
description: A sandwich that aspires to be sushi. Are you surprised at how tasty it is? Good—that's the idea.
location: From Sushi Oficianado in Casseroya Lake

name: Great Sushi Sandwich
description: A sandwich made with a love of sushi foremost in the mind. The bitterness of the watercress works well here.
location: From Sushi Oficianado in Casseroya Lake

name: Ultra Sushi Sandwich
description: A sandwich dreamed up by a sushi aficionado. The sheer amount of sandwich going on here is part of the appeal.
location: From Sushi Oficianado in Casseroya Lake

name: Master Sushi Sandwich
description: The ultimate form of the Sushi Sandwich. The refreshing sourness elevates this sandwich to masterpiece level.
location: From Sushi Oficianado in Casseroya Lake
